creator: michael.platzer@knallgrau.at
text:
I encountered troubles while i tried to update mod_jk from 1.2.5 to 1.2.15.
Everything went fine, except that opera-users were suddenly not able to login
(to my Jetty application) anymore. It turned out that opera just wasn't able to
send its session-cookie correctly to the application anymore. Googling a bit
around brought me to this post, resp comment:
http://my.opera.com/community/forums/topic.dml?id=112287&t=1138117544&page=1#comment1276380
which indicates that mod_jk is the one to blame, since "cookie2-headers are
passed as cookie-headers". i cant verify this, but i am filing this bug-report
here, so that you are aware of this issue.
Currently Jetty + mod_jk is unfortunately not usable for us because of this bug.

creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text: It's been fixed in the SVN trunk for several weeks already.
